expat   : Expat 2.0.0
ft2     : Freetype 2.1.10 (http://www.freetype.org)
glew    : glew-1.3.1 (http://glew.sourceforge.net)
jpeg    : jpeg-6b (http://www.ijg.org)
lua     : lua-5.1 (http://www.lua.org)
pcre    : pcre-6.4 (http://www.pcre.org/)
png     : libpng-1.2.8 (http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html)
tinyxml : TinyXML-2.4.3 (http://www.grinninglizard.com/tinyxml)
zlib    : ZLib-1.2.2 (http://www.zlib.net/)

NOTE: These libraries are all free to use in commercial/non-OSS products.
